title: "You're Protected by Headgum Now!" - With Jake Hurwitz
itunes:title: "You're Protected by Headgum Now!" - With Jake Hurwitz
description:
This week we welcome the pride of the Dwarfanage Jake Hurwitz to uncover many a mystery ... a DnD game spanning three generations, time-traveling tips for our first TTRPG, why Jasper's cancelled and the origin story of his droplets?!


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

Theme Music by Jonathan Charles

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
